api_list.name: Transactions
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://orderful.p.rapidapi.com/transactions/8209520"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "orderful.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://orderful.p.rapidapi.com/transactions/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "orderful.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
